ActCanadian Human Rights Act
PrecisAppointment of KATHRYN A. RAYMOND, Q.C., of Bedford, Nova Scotia, to be a full-time member of the Canadian Human Rights Tribunal, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective May 27, 2021.
